# init()

**Initializer**

Initializes a default set of UDP connection options.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Customizing UDP Connections

- **preferNoChecksum**: A Boolean that configures the connection to not send UDP checksums.

items.description: A Boolean that configures the connection to not send UDP checksums.
